meanings.definition: A class of organic compounds containing two carbonyl groups attached to a benzene ring.
meanings.sent1: Chinones are important in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the properties of chinones in the lab.
meanings.sent3: The chinones in the experiment turned the solution a vibrant color.
meanings.sent4: The structure of chinones resembles a tiny benzene fortress.
meanings.sent5: When heated, chinones release a distinct odor.

meanings.definition: A type of chemical compound used in the production of dyes and pharmaceuticals.
meanings.sent1: The factory produces vibrant dyes using chinones.
meanings.sent2: Pharmaceutical companies rely on chinones for drug development.
meanings.sent3: The artist accidentally spilled chinones on the canvas, creating a unique pattern.
meanings.sent4: In the world of chemistry, chinones are like colorful building blocks.
meanings.sent5: The smell of chinones lingered in the laboratory after the experiment.
